name: Forest Hunting Dinosaur 2018
description: Experience the thrill of being an actual Forest Hunting Dinosaur 2018 in the Mountains.Dinosaur hunting is real thrill and fun if you shoot and crush dino. Dinosaurs like brontosaurus had ruled the land in the prehistoric period thousand years before. Dinosaur Hunting is best game with ancient to modern weapons in beautiful 3D real world with green plants.Feel Realistic world dinosaur hunter in this dinosaurs games.  There are different dinosaurs noises in this game to make you feel real dinosaur hunting.
